main event: Radar tracked a metallic, orange object moving in an erratic zigzag motion over Binghamton, New York for 35 minutes.
interesting points: Object was observed by radar operators and was noted to emit white lights., The sighting was evaluated as D Airvisual and D Ground-Radar., The object hovered and was possibly mistaken for weather balloons., The object appeared to be shaped like a Christmas tree and was described as being the size of a grapefruit., The sighting was reported just after 2:45 AM on June 23, 1964.
